text: "They Don't Understand" is a song recorded by American country music group Sawyer Brown. It was released in August 2005 as the second single from the album Mission Temple Fireworks Stand. The song reached #36 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart. The song was written by Dean Chance. Teresa Chance, Steve Miller and Jeff Wood. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2005) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Hot Christian Songs |align="center"|15 |} ==References== Category:2005 singles Category:2005 songs Category:Sawyer Brown songs Category:Curb Records singles
title: They Don't Understand
